loans.name: Eric

texts.en:
Eric lives in Kitale. Kitale is located in the Trans-Nzoia district of western Kenya. Originally dominated by English settlers in the early 20th century, the region’s farmland was redistributed after independence. This left Trans-Nzoia one of Kenya’s most cosmopolitan areas, with individuals from a variety of linguistic and ethnic groups living in close proximity. The lush soil of the region ensures that farmers can grow a variety of crops, including maize, sunflower, sugar cane, millet, and beans. Eric is married and has six children. He is a village Elder. He is also a farmer. He has been farming for forty years now and he is currently growing maize, avocado, and fodder, and he also keeps livestock. Eric is excited about beekeeping as it will earn him some income from the sale of honey and provide him with honey for medicine.

This is Eric’s first loan with Honey Care and he plans to use the proceeds from his beehives to educate his children and invest in his farm. Eric’s hope for the future is to live a comfortable life.

loans.use: To buy beehives and apiary materials for honey production

loans.name: Marlon Xavier

texts.es:
Marlon Xavier tiene 22 años de edad, es soltero, sin hijos a su cargo, vive en casa familiar, en una zona rural del distrito de Oyotún, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, costa norte de Perú.

Marlon Xavier se dedica a brindar servicio de transporte en su mototaxi, desde hace 5 años, su servicio lo ofrece en su comunidad y en los alrededores; él solicita préstamo para invertir en activo fijo; pues desea realizar el mantenimiento de su moto para asegurar el correcto funcionamiento de su herramienta de trabajo, así como también poder brindar un mejor servicio a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Marlon Xavier is 22 years old.  He is single, without any children to care for.  He lives in his family's home in a rural area of the Oyotún district, Chiclayo province, Lambayeque region, on the northern coast of Peru.

For five years, Marlon Xavier has worked offering transportation services with his mototaxi.  He offers his services in his community and the surrounding areas.  He is asking for this loan to invest in fixed assets.  He wants to perform maintenance on his motorcycle in order to make sure that this work tool functioning properly.  In this way he can also offer better service to his customers.

loans.use: to perform maintenance on his motorcycle.

loans.name: Anna

texts.en:
Anna lives in Kitale. Kitale is located in the Trans-Nzoia district of western Kenya. It is located close to Uganda, and Mount Elgon, an extinct volcano which straddles the two nations and even has a peak at the Kenya-Uganda border. Founded by European settlers in the early 1900s, Kitale originally grew due to its proximity to the Ugandan railway. The area around Kitale is filled with natural forests, and maintenance of tree cover by the area’s residents has helped both preserve the region’s soil and ensured that the area remains good for beekeeping. Kitale is the headquarters of the Kenya Seed Company, whose massive sunflower plantations provide nearby bees with a veritable buffet of high-quality forage.

Anna is married and has six children. Both she and her husband are farmers. They have been farming for twenty-nine years now and they are currently growing maize, beans, vegetables, and bananas. Anna is also the chair-lady of her local church. She is excited about beekeeping, as it will earn her some income from the sale of honey.

This is Anna’s first loan with Honey Care, and she plans to use the proceeds from her beehives to invest in her farm. Anna’s hope for the future is to live a better life.

loans.use: To buy beehives and apiary materials for honey productions

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
Evelyn lives in Kitale. Kitale is located in the Trans-Nzoia district of western Kenya, and at over 6,300 feet above sea level, is one of Africa’s most elevated towns. The rich soil of the area makes it one of the nation's biggest maize producing regions, lending it the nickname of “the breadbasket of Kenya.” Many farmers in the region have started projects planting bluegum trees on their land, which complement the region’s natural forests and provide bees with a variety of food sources. The people around Kitale have been beekeeping for centuries, and the area is dense with strong bee colonies.

Evelyn is married and has three children. She is a farmer while her husband is a Pastor. She has been farming for the last three years and she is currently growing maize, vegetables and bananas. Evelyn is excited about beekeeping as it will provide her with honey for food.

This is Evelyn’s first loan with Honey Care and she plans to use the proceeds from her beehives to invest in her farm. Evelyn’s hope for the future is to live a fulfilling life.

loans.use: To buy beehives and apiary materials for honey production

Sennah is excited about beekeeping as the bees will help in pollinating her crops.

This is Sennah’s first loan with Honey Care and she plans to use the proceeds from her beehives to build a zero grazing unit. Sennah’s hope for the future is to live a good and comfortable life.

loans.use: To buy beehives and apiary materials for honey production

loans.name: Prisila

loans.name: Isabel Del Carmen

texts.es: Isabel de 33 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus tres hijos, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa de segunda mano desde hace 4 años, su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia y tiene mucha clientela por los buenos precios y la calidad del producto, Isabel esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas ropa por mayor como: camisas, blusas, faldas, vestidos, pantalones, etc. para poder surtir con mas mercadería su negocio y asi obtener mejores ganancias y darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Isabel, age 33, lives in her own house with her husband and three kids.  She has worked selling second-hand clothing for four years.  Her business is located in her home.  She has lots of customers because of her good prices and product quality.  

Isabel is asking for a loan to buy more clothing in bulk, such as shirts, tops, skirts, dresses, pants, etc.  This is to stock her business with more merchandise and, in this way, get better earnings and give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy more clothing in bulk, such as shirts, tops, skirts, dresses, pants, etc.

loans.name: Sara Yaneth

texts.es: Sara de 44 años de edad es madre soltera vive en casa propia con su hijo de 23 años de edad quien trabaja y le ayuda económicamente, ella posee una pequeña tienda ubicada en su lugar de residencia desde hace 10 años, tiene clientela fija que la buscan por los buenos precios, Sara esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas mercadería como frijoles, huevos, detergentes, refrescos, golosinas, sopas, etc.  para surtir su tienda y asi obtener mejores ganancias.
texts.en:
Sara, age 44, is a single mother.  She lives in her own house with her son, age 23.  He works and helps her financially.  For the past ten years, she has had a small store located in her home.  She has a regular clientele who seek her out for her good prices.  

Sara is asking for a loan to buy more merchandise such as beans, eggs, detergents, soft drinks, snacks, soups, etc., in order to stock her store and thus get better earnings.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise, such as beans, eggs, detergents, soft drinks, snacks, soups, etc.

loans.name: Joseline

texts.en:
Joseline is a lady aged 45 years from Rugaaga, a village in Isingiro District. She is predominantly an agriculturalist engaged in farming and animal husbandry on a small scale. 

Joseline got married at the early age of sixteen years. They stayed together for some years and produced four children. Later the man became very violent to the extent that he was beating her. Because of fear for her dear life, she decided to divorce this man and she went with the children. 

Life became difficult as Joseline had no source of income. She decided to start up a piggery project with the loan of 1,000,000 (UGX) she got from UGAFODE. She later saved some money and built a house for her family. She is now requesting a loan of 3,000,000 (UGX) to add manure to her banana plantation.

loans.use: To buy cow manure and mulch

loans.name: Ruth

texts.en:
Ruth lives in Kitale. Kitale is located in the Trans-Nzoia district of western Kenya. Originally dominated by English settlers in the early 20th century, the region’s farmland was redistributed after independence. This left Trans-Nzoia one of Kenya’s most cosmopolitan areas, with individuals from a variety of linguistic and ethnic groups living in close proximity. The lush soil of the region ensures that farmers can grow a variety of crops, including maize, sunflower, sugar cane, millet, and beans. Kitale is located near Mount Elgon, East Africa's oldest and largest solitary extinct volcano, whose substantial forest cover makes Kitale a high-potential beekeeping region.

Ruth is married and has three children. She runs her own business and she also farms. She has been farming for twenty years now and she is currently growing maize, beans and trees and she also keeps livestock. Ruth is excited about beekeeping as it will earn her some income from the sale of honey and the bees will help in pollinating her crops.

This is Ruth’s first loan with Honey Care and she plans to use the proceeds from her beehives to buy more cows. Ruth’s hope for the future is to live a comfortable life.

loans.use: To buy beehives and apiary materials for honey production

loans.name: Maria Del Rosario

texts.es: Maria de 59 años de edad vive con su esposo y su hija de 19 años de edad quien estudia actualmente, doña Maria posee una pequeña tienda ubicada en su lugar de residencia desde hace 12 años, esos años de experiencia le han ayudado a poder tener en pie su negocio y que los clientes siempre la busquen, ella quiere invertir más en la tienda pero no tiene suficiente capital por esa razón solicito un crédito a INTEGRAL para poder comprar sopas, granos básicos, huevos, refrescos, detergentes, golosinas, etc. así poder obtener mejores ganancias y tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Maria, age 59, lives with her husband and their daughter, age 19, who is currently a student.  For the past twelve years, Maria has had a little store located in her home.  These years of experience have helped her to be able to keep her store on its feet.  Her customers always seek her out.  

She wants to invest more in her store but doesn’t have enough capital.  For this reason, she is asking for a loan from INTEGRAL to be able to buy soup, basic staples, eggs, soft drinks, detergents, snacks, etc.  In this way she can get better earnings and have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy soups, basic staples, eggs, soft drinks, detergents, snacks, etc.

loans.name: Saumu

texts.en:
Saumu is married and has three children, two of whom attend school. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. She operates a coconut business, selling at the market to her neighbours and passersby. She faces a major challenge of seasonality in her business, but she is working hard to make both ends meet.

With the KES 50,000 loan, she wants to purchase seven sacks of coconuts to sell. She decided to join Yehu to access loans, to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase seven sacks of coconuts to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy another dairy cow.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary lives in Kitale. Kitale is located in the Trans-Nzoia district of western Kenya, and at over 6,300 feet above sea level, is one of Africa’s most elevated towns. The rich soil of the area makes it one of the nation's biggest maize producing regions, lending it the nickname of “the breadbasket of Kenya.” Many farmers in the region have started projects planting bluegum trees on their land, which complement the region’s natural forests and provide bees with a variety of food sources. The people around Kitale have been beekeeping for centuries, and the area is dense with strong bee colonies.

Mary is a widow with three children. She is a farmer. She has been farming for three years now and she is currently growing maize, beans, and vegetables. She is also a member of her local church’s choir. Mary is excited about beekeeping, as it will earn her some income from the sale of honey and provide her with honey for food. 

This is Mary’s first loan with Honey Care and she plans to use the proceeds from her beehives to start a small business. Mary’s hope for the future is to live a comfortable life.

loans.use: To buy beehives and apiary materials for honey production

loans.name: Dorcas

texts.en:
Dorcas lives in Kitale. Kitale is located in the Trans-Nzoia district of western Kenya. It is located close to Uganda, and Mount Elgon, an extinct volcano which straddles the two nations and even has a peak at the Kenya-Uganda border. Founded by European settlers in the early 1900s, Kitale originally grew due to its proximity to the Ugandan railway. The area around Kitale is filled with natural forests, and maintenance of tree cover by the area’s residents has helped both preserve the region’s soil and ensured that the area remains good for beekeeping. Kitale is the headquarters of the Kenya Seed Company, whose massive sunflower plantations provide nearby bees with a veritable buffet of high-quality forage.

Dorcas is single with one child. She runs her own business. She is also a farmer. She has been farming for three years now and she is currently growing maize, beans, and potatoes. Dorcas is excited about beekeeping, as it will provide her with honey for medicine.

This is Dorcas’ first loan with Honey Care and she plans to use the proceeds from her beehives to invest in her business. Dorcas’ hope for the future is to live a good life.

loans.use: To buy beehives and apiary materials for honey production

loans.name: Oscar Leonardo

texts.es:
El medio ambiente forma parte importante en el planeta y es bueno saber que aun hay personas que se dedican a cuidar y aprovechar lo que en ellas se encuentran, y lo aprovechan como un actividad productivo tal es el caso de Oscar que desde muy pequeño le enseñaron a recolectar hule, el tiene 24 años de edad  que tiene la motivación suficiente en emprender actividades todos los días para tener un futuro mejor.

La actividad que Oscar ha venido realizando desde hace 5 años es la recolección de hules en las montañas de su comunidad el realiza dicha actividad porque su padre le enseño.  El lo aprendió de sus padres ya que es la única herencia que ellos le dejaron y es por ello que el se a dedicado a los mismos para poder tener un ingreso económico para su familia e obtener ganancias para el sustento de su familia.

El propósito de la realización del préstamo de Oscar es para la compra de terreno ya que desde un tiempo atrás el ha querido tener terreno propio para realizar actividades agrícolas y eso lo motivo a realizar su préstamo.

Oscar quiere ser diferente que sus padres y uno de sus más grandes aspiraciones por el futuro es la construcción de su propia casa para tener las condiciones de vida adecuada y ser un buen ejemplo en su comunidad.
texts.en:
The environment plays an important role on our planet.  It is good to know that there are still people who work to care for it and make use of what they find in it.  They make use of it as a line of work, just like Oscar, who from a very young age was taught to collect rubber.  He is 24 years old, and he has enough self-motivation to undertake work every day in order to have a better future.

Oscar’s job for the past five years has been collecting rubber in the mountains around his community.  He does this work because his father taught him.  He learned it from his parents because it the the only inheritance they left him.  It is because of this that he works at the same type of job, in order to be able to have an income for his family and to get earnings to provide for his family.

The purpose of Oscar’s loan is to buy a plot of land because, for a while now, he has wanted to have his own land to be able to farm.  This motivated him to ask for a loan.

Oscar wants to be different from his parents and one of his biggest aspirations for the future is to build his own house in order to have adequate living conditions and to be a good example in his community.

loans.use: to buy a plot of land

loans.name: Nathan

texts.en:
Nathan lives in Kitale. Kitale is located in the Trans-Nzoia district of western Kenya, and at over 6,300 feet above sea level, is one of Africa’s most elevated towns. The rich soil of the area makes it one of the nation's biggest maize producing regions, lending it the nickname of “the breadbasket of Kenya.” Many farmers in the region have started projects planting bluegum trees on their land, which complement the region’s natural forests and provide bees with a variety of food sources. The people around Kitale have been beekeeping for centuries, and the area is dense with strong bee colonies.

Nathan is married and has five children. He is a member of his local school’s Board of Governors. He is a farmer as well. He has been farming for fourteen years now and he is currently growing maize, beans, and vegetables. Nathan is excited about beekeeping, as it will earn him some income from the sale of honey and the bees will help in pollinating his crops.

This is Nathan’s first loan with Honey Care, and he plans to use the proceeds from his beehives to invest in his projects. Nathan’s hope for the future is to see his family’s standards of living raised.

loans.use: To buy beehives and apiary materials for honey production
